ModMetaData.name: ExGT WorldWar (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: 小面包
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://img.litet.net/logos/Info.png[/img] Update of 小面包s mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2977704572
[img]https://img.litet.net/logos/Notice.png[/img]
[table] [tr][td][url=https://discord.gg/h5TY6DA][img]https://img.litet.net/logos/Discord.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/ExGTWorldWar][img]https://img.litet.net/logos/Github.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://img.litet.net/logos/SafeToAdd.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://img.litet.net/logos/RemoveMayWork.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://img.litet.net/logos/OriginalDescription.png[/img] [h1]profileI[/h1]
[b]This mod has added some experimental equipment ，uniforms，mechanoid boss and weapons from World War I[/b]
[h1]Special mechanisms[/h1]
[b]bayonet charge[/b] [url=https://sm.ms/image/dY5AiE2lFn4agbL][img]https://s2.loli.net/2023/05/19/dY5AiE2lFn4agbL.gif[/img][/url] [b]Call of the Dead[/b] [url=https://sm.ms/image/u4K59OE7ZHcSkmb][img]https://s2.loli.net/2023/05/19/u4K59OE7ZHcSkmb.gif[/img][/url] [b]White phosphorus smoke grenade[/b] [url=https://sm.ms/image/f3671ueovnzyHxk][img]https://s2.loli.net/2023/05/19/f3671ueovnzyHxk.gif[/img][/url] [b]Adrenaline injection[/b] [url=https://sm.ms/image/j5hB4EbPRs3wtF7][img]https://s2.loli.net/2023/05/19/j5hB4EbPRs3wtF7.gif[/img][/url]
[h1]compatibility[/h1]
[b]CE compatibility[/b]:float
dll by 空曜
[img]https://img.litet.net/logos/ReportingIssues.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Always post your log using the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Log Uploader[/url] [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
